about.summary: Noto CJK fonts from Google. Includes only variable fonts (both proportional and monospance).
Noto CJK fonts from Google. Includes only variable fonts (both proportional and monospance).

name: font-ttf-noto-cjk

new_version_errors.20201206-cjk:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '20201206-cjk' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://github.com/googlefonts/noto-cjk/releases/download/Sans{{ version }}/02_NotoSansCJK-TTF-VF.zip'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.004' %}

package:
  name: font-ttf-noto-cjk
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/googlefonts/noto-cjk/releases/download/Sans{{ version }}/02_NotoSansCJK-TTF-VF.zip
  sha256: f4665e9cb15896d7a29140ae8ef5a2d2121dd10d75a4067e0c598a5df041a933

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic

test:
  requires:
    # dummy to have at least one test env requirement
    - bzip2
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/fonts/NotoSansCJKhk-VF.ttf       # [unix]

about:
  home: https://www.google.com/get/noto
  dev_url: https://github.com/googlefonts/noto-cjk
  summary: Noto CJK fonts from Google. Includes only variable fonts (both proportional and monospance).
  license: OFL-1.1
  license_file: LICENSE
  license_family: OTHER

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - izahn
